CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper November 21, 1953, pg. 13, reads: "Young Violinist - Roberta Mai Ratcliffe, tenth grade student at Westinghouse, will be one of the featured artists at the second musical salon given Sunday, Nov. 22, by Marie Carter Hayes at her studio on Frankstown Avenue. Miss Ratcliffe has studied under Mihail Stolarevski, director of the School of Music at PCA; is a member of the senior orchestra at Westinghouse and served as concert mistress during her last year at Baxter Junior High. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Westinghouse High School student Roberta Mai Ratcliffe holding violin in interior with geometric patterned wallpaper
